meta.title: Lights
meta.summary: Connect and control you LED's with this tool.

content:
Intro

Caught this killer band 'Cecil and Delilah' live at Comet Ping Pong.

Nice to know they have a web presence!

Jokes. Their presence could use some work, lets be honest. Just like this segway into talking about this light thingy which could also use some wokr!

Not gonna explain what it is. You'll just have to figure that part out.

I'll need some feedback too once this is all over. ktx

Dashboard
